entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
